weave:transform-message.weave:set-payload: %weave 0.1 %input payload application/java %output application/csv --- payload map { Name: $.Name when ($.Name != null) otherwise "", IDInA: $.IDInA when ($.IDInA != null) otherwise "", IndustryInA: $.IndustryInA when ($.IndustryInA != null) otherwise "", NumberOfEmployeesInA: $.NumberOfEmployeesInA when ($.NumberOfEmployeesInA != null) otherwise "", IDInB: $.IDInB when ($.IDInB != null) otherwise "", IndustryInB: $.IndustryInB when ($.IndustryInB != null) otherwise "", NumberOfEmployeesInB: $.NumberOfEmployeesInB when ($.NumberOfEmployeesInB != null) otherwise "" }
